column4: guys i have a major problem been seeking help for one full day.
i have problems with sound with my sony vaio laptop. so i reinstalled it once again today and configured my sound but still i am not getting the sound
i upgraded alsa to the latest drivers too with the help of a tutor online
maybe you need a specific kernel module for the vaio, if you do a lspci can you find your sound card in the listing ?
